META.TITLE: chessbutbetter | It's chess, but better
META.DESCRIPTION: Play chessbutbetter — reimagined chess with 3D graphics, animations, and online gameplay. It's chess, but better.

PRIVACY_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Privacy policy for the chess game. Accepting the privacy policy refers to the collection and use of personal data in accordance with this policy.

PLAY.DESCRIPTION: Play chess with 3D graphics and animations. Play against the computer or a friend.

PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long

GAME.GAME_NOT_FOUND_DESC: The game you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.

RESIGN.CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to resign?
RESIGN.WARNING: The game will be ended and you will lose.

DRAW.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to accept the draw offer?
DRAW.OFFER_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to offer a draw?
DRAW.ACCEPT_WARNING: If you accept, the game will be ended as a draw.
DRAW.OFFER_WARNING: If the opponent accepts, the game will be ended as a draw.

ABOUT_SITE.TITLE: Legal Disclosure
ABOUT_SITE.ACCOUNTABILITY_TEXT1: As service providers, we are liable for the content of our own websites in accordance with § 7 paragraph 1 of the TMG (German Telemedia Act).
ABOUT_SITE.ACCOUNTABILITY_TEXT2: However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we as service providers are not obligated to permanently monitor submitted or stored information or to search for evidence that indicates illegal activities.
ABOUT_SITE.ACCOUNTABILITY_TEXT3: Legal obligations to removing information or to blocking the use of information remain unchallenged. In this case, liability is only possible at the time of knowledge about a specific violation of law. Illegal content will be removed immediately at the time we get knowledge of it.
ABOUT_SITE.DISPUTE_RESOLUTION_TEXT: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):

ACCEPT_COOKIES.TITLE: Accept Cookies
ACCEPT_COOKIES.MESSAGE: Enabling this will allow the website to store cookies on your device, which can enhance your experience by remembering your preferences and settings.

REJECT_COOKIES.TITLE: Reject Cookies
REJECT_COOKIES.MESSAGE: Enabling this will prevent the website from storing cookies on your device, which may limit some functionalities and features.
